modName: Todd Howard and The Book of Lies
summary: A small catalog of all of Todd Howard's lies. Will be updated with each discovered lie.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Todd Howard.[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/R7ImdXV.png[/img][/center]
[size=5]
[center]The man, the legend, the liar.[/center][/size]

[size=3]I've been looking through every little Stream with Todd Howard in it, and documented all the lies I've found.

I will update it in time, as new lies are made, or truths are found.

Just a small mod, my room turns into an oven while my computer is on in summer, so have fun with it.

The Â book can be bough from book merchants or found in locations that were lied about.
Share pictures of locations youve found them in, I'd like to see how long it takes you!

Also, the book raises Speech, because the Toddler is so good at lying.[/size]
author: ToxicBrown1
